title: [Context ] | A Polite Coup, by Ian Buruma (Harper's Magazine Foundation)
text: ( Source : Harper's Magazine Foundation ) Published in the June 2015 issue of Harper's Magazine, 'A Polite Coup ' examines why Thailand has so often found itself under the rule of a military junta. The article is free to read in full through
